title: Top Silver 1 Main looking for team.
body:
I main top. I enjoy playing 5s. I have decent mechanics and macro play. I prefer carry top laners over tanks but am versatile.
I play a lot so ideally the team would play regularly.  Cool Cool. add me - Pooh

My Champ pool atm:
Yasuo (main)
Gangplank
Casseopeia
Fiora 
Trundle
Rumble

Going to work on jax and olaf too.

replies.body:
G'day mates, keen to play with some squads of peeps.

IGN: Willis Dogg
Rank: Gold 4 (50 LP ish)
Roles: Top, Mid, Sup (in order of preference)
support main if you are still looking, SIlver 2 atm
one2kill i main sp and ad

ADC main in Silver 3
I've got a hand full of players in an unofficial 'team' and I'm always looking for new players. Add me if you're interested.
Also if you can think of cool team name would be nice.
